original_solution_mapping.L1: 35 miles into 5 equal portions will be 35/5 = <<35/5=7>>7 miles each
original_solution_mapping.L2: Abel traveled at a speed of 40 miles per hour for 0.7 hours so he will cover 40*0.7 = <<40*0.7=28>>28 miles
original_solution_mapping.L3: 7 miles make a portion so 28 miles is equivalent to 28/7 = <<28/7=4>>4 portions

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2575.
    Returns: the number of portions of the journey covered.
    """
    # L1
    total_distance = 35 # 35 miles
    num_portions = 5 # 5 equal portions
    miles_per_portion = total_distance / num_portions

    # L2
    speed = 40 # speed of 40 miles per hour
    time_traveled = 0.7 # traveling for 0.7 hours
    distance_covered = speed * time_traveled

    # L3
    portions_covered = distance_covered / miles_per_portion

    # FA
    answer = portions_covered
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: {total_distance} miles into {num_portions} equal portions will be {total_distance}/{num_portions} = <<{total_distance}/{num_portions}={miles_per_portion}>>{miles_per_portion} miles each
Abel traveled at a speed of {speed} miles per hour for {time_traveled} hours so he will cover {speed}*{time_traveled} = <<{speed}*{time_traveled}={distance_covered}>>{distance_covered} miles

{miles_per_portion} miles make a portion so {distance_covered} miles is equivalent to {distance_covered}/{miles_per_portion} = <<{distance_covered}/{miles_per_portion}={portions_covered}>>{portions_covered} portions

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Abel traveled at a speed of 40 miles per hour for 0.7 hours so he will cover 40*0.7 = <<40*0.7=28>>28 miles
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: 7 miles make a portion so 28 miles is equivalent to 28/7 = <<28/7=196>>196 portions

explanation: Incorrect operation. The calculation should use '/' but used '*' instead.
